PreCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/17/0xe45f944e04a8e8617bb705e33c80b74e806d1e60.sol#307-313) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (preCrowdsaleStartTime == 0 || now < preCrowdsaleEndTime) && tokensSent != TOKEN_CAP

	External calls:
	- token.transfer(sender,contributionInTokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0xe45f944e04a8e8617bb705e33c80b74e806d1e60.sol#322-324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
